prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large prismatic flame cosmic head with unique merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, tetractys patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by electric and neutral grey inspired by dynamic angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with pulsing Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor VAUAAMP's profile: 'He who initiates action', Aethyr MAZ, Fire element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'In VAUAAMP's presence, a first spark of creation sketches sacred angles in living fire one feels the prime mover igniting all beginnings.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic flame cosmic head with unique merkaba structure

visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, tetractys patterns from sacred geometry symbolism

profile_data.title: 'He who initiates action'
profile_data.essence: In VAUAAMP's presence, a first spark of creation sketches sacred angles in living fire one feels the prime mover igniting all beginnings.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of First Flame of Action; marshals blazing hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic flame-geometry emerging from a multifaceted dodecahedral core, representing the transformative power of first action and the crystalline structure of pure will. The form suggests both the rigid structure of Geburah and the dynamic momentum of fire.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Vermilion represents Aries' martial energy, while electric gold symbolizes divine initiatory force. The pulsing pattern reflects the living, dynamic nature of first action.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent divine emergence, cosmic interconnection, and hierarchical manifestation of spiritual forces
